author: ryanleeschneider
content: Anyone else seeing lots of instability in their goerli nodes?  Anyone else actually still running any? ðŸ™‚

author: pk910
content:
I've shut down my lighthouse goerli nodes yesterday because they're having problems with the long unfinality and were unable to produce blocks anymore (operation timed out).
network looks really bad at the moment (<10% participation), I guess there are more clients having problems with the long unfinality?

author: pk910
content: (I'm running 200 validators only, so shouldn't matter much)

author: nishant0
content: Participation is more like 40% rather than 10%, beaconcha.in seems to have gone offline for a while and might have been stuck in a fork. But yeah unfinality does stress clients and a lot more stuck nodes now
